0.text: Innate: Amumu's basic attacks and  Curse of the Sad Mummy are empowered to mark enemies with Curse for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and  Despair's per-tick damage.
0.html: Innate: Amumu's basic attacks and Curse of the Sad Mummy are empowered to mark enemies with Curse for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and Despair's per-tick damage.
markedPassages: Curse of the Sad Mummy
Despair's

1.text: Cursed targets receive  10% bonus true damage from all incoming pre-mitigation magic damage.
1.html: Cursed targets receive 10% bonus true damage from all incoming pre-mitigation magic damage.
markedPassages: 10% bonus true damage

0.text: Active: Amumu tosses a bandage in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  stunning them for 1 second and  pulling him to them, during which they are  revealed.
0.html: Active: Amumu tosses a bandage in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, stunning them for 1 second and pulling him to them, during which they are revealed.
markedPassages: stunning
pulling
revealed

1.text: Amumu periodically stocks a Bandage Toss charge, up to a maximum of 2.
1.html: Amumu periodically stocks a Bandage Toss charge, up to a maximum of 2.

2.text: Despair can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Despair can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Despair

0.text: Toggle: Amumu cries a continuous pool of tears, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies.
0.html: Toggle: Amumu cries a continuous pool of tears, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: (+ 0.5 / 0.575 / 0.65 / 0.725 / 0.8% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
(+ 0.5 / 0.575 / 0.65 / 0.725 / 0.8% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

0.text: Passive: Amumu  reduces every instance of post-mitigation physical damage taken, capped at 50% of the damage instance.
0.html: Passive: Amumu reduces every instance of post-mitigation physical damage taken, capped at 50% of the damage instance.
markedPassages: reduces

1.text: Active: Amumu releases his anger, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
1.html: Active: Amumu releases his anger, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

2.text: Tantrum's cooldown is  reduced by 0.5 seconds whenever Amumu is hit by a  basic attack.
2.html: Tantrum's cooldown is  reduced by 0.5 seconds whenever Amumu is hit by a basic attack.

basic attack
